-  DateFormatter.Style.short 

Case# DateFormatter.Style.short

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
case short
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/dateformatter/style/short#Discussion)

Specifies a short style, typically numeric only, such as “11/23/37” or “3:30 PM”.

Equal to `kCFDateFormatterShortStyle`.
